training_phrases: I want to speak to an advisor
How can I invest with you?
Can you tell me about your services?
I need help with my finances
I'm interested in working with Neish Capital

parameters_to_collect.name: full_name
parameters_to_collect.prompt: Before I connect you, could you please provide your full name?
parameters_to_collect.message_on_failure: Sorry, I missed your name. Please provide your full name so our advisor can contact you.

parameters_to_collect.name: email_address
parameters_to_collect.prompt: And what is the best email address for our team to reach out to you?
parameters_to_collect.message_on_failure: Please provide a valid email address so we can send the information securely.

parameters_to_collect.name: area_of_interest
parameters_to_collect.prompt: Lastly, what is your primary area of interest? (e.g., Investment, Advisory, or Compliance)
parameters_to_collect.message_on_failure: Thank you, that helps us route you correctly.

final_response: Thank you, {{full_name}}. Your request has been securely logged. A member of our advisory team will be in contact with you shortly.
